eu.monnetproject.translation.langmodels

Interface Counter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExhaustiveCounter, LossyCounter, LossyCounterWithHistory, StickySamplingCounter

    public interface Counter
    A method for counting the n-gram frequencies in the string
    Author:
    John McCrae

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NGramCountSet counts()
      Finalize the counts, and return them as a set of counts
      void docEnd()
      Indicate that current document has ended
      int N()
      The largest n-gram being counted
      void offer(int w)
      Accept the next word in the current stream
